name: M.U.S.H.A.
summary: M.U.S.H.A. is a Sega Genesis vertical-scrolling shooter from Compile and Seismic originally released in 1990 and later re-released on the Nintendo Virtual Console in 2009. The game is known for its rarity and its ability to fetch high prices on auction sites.

alternative_names.name: Musha Aleste: Full Metal Fighter Ellinor

esrb.synopsis: This is an arcade-style space shooter in which players pilot a mechanized robot that engages enemy ships in constant combat. The perspective is top-down, as players shoot small ships or objects for points and can pick up power-ups along the way. More challenging boss characters appear at the end of stages.
